description:
Creamy alfredo and wild mushrooms - a great combination to spoil your palate after a long day on the trail.

  • Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add
  • Ingredients: pasta (wheat), Milk ingredients, champignon mushrooms, potato starch, romano cheese powder (romano cheese [milk, bacterial cultures, salt, enzymes], disodium phosphate), parmesan cheese powder (parmesan cheese [partially skimmed milk, bacterial cultures, salt, enzymes], disodium phosphate), butter powder (butter, skim milk powder, sodium caseinate, sodium phosphate), shallots, dried garlic, sea salt, seasoning (yeast extract, salt, canola oil), onion, shiitake extract powder (maltodextrin, shiitake extract, salt), black pepper, spinach
  • Allergens - contains: wheat and milk
  • No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy
  • Meals have a 5-year shelf life
name: AlpineAire Wild Mushroom Fettuccine Alfredo
